Now this game is pretty violent. I'd say a bit more than it's sequel, CS:GO. But I will say, it's fun. They have fun gamemodes that tops CS:GO's, Garry's mod, and others. Gun Game, Jailbreak, and more modes only found on Source.

This game is a tad expensive, but I'd say it's worth it. it's fun, and action fast paced.

good very good

If I feel like playing a shooting game that I know from young child hood was fun and cool, I'd say CSS is very recommended since its fun and also requires you to be fast on the trigger (like most shooting action games in first person) but CSS is just my favorite and will always have a special spot in my memory and heart for such action games, I recommend it for people who looks for a fun and easy action shooting game that they can use to play with their friends etc.

Also it can be a nice and kinda calming time killer if you ask me ^^ it just has a way to make me relaxed atleast xD  oh and also it can actually be used for roleplaying ^^ if you use Steam voice chat or other voice chat programs =) ofc. steam would be easiest as you then wont have multiple programs running =) saving power on the pc/laptop for better gaming experience =).

Regards Reignboy ! =) happy gaming to all of you out there ;D
This is a very fun game and I play it alot.Alot of people only bought it for garry's mod but it is better than that. 8/10

Kultklassiker im Multiplayer - Shooter, den man EXTREM lange spielen kann, ohne das er langweilig wird.

Grafik (7/10)
Sieht dafür, dass das Spiel schon 10 Jahre alt ist, noch gut aus.

Atmosphäre (8/10)
Es gibt verschiedene Maps, und die sehen sehr gut aus.

Story (-/-)
Eigentlich gibt es keine ^^

Gameplay (10/10)
Es macht unglaublich viel Spaß.
Es gibt viele Waffen, viele Server, gute Gegner und eine gute Steuerung. Was will man mehr.

Im Durchschnitt: 8,3

Counter-Strike: Source retains its team-based objective-oriented first-person shooter style gameplay. The aim of playing a map is to accomplish a map's objective: defusing the bomb, rescuing all hostages, or killing the entire opposing team. The ultimate goal of the game is to win more rounds than the opposing team. Once players are killed, they do not respawn until the next round, though this depends on which server people play on. This gameplay feature distinguishes Counter-Strike from other first-person shooter games, where players respawn instantly or after a short delay.

Shooting while moving dramatically decreases accuracy, and holding the trigger down to continuously shoot produces severe recoil. The severity of damage induced by weaponry is dependent upon the specific locations of hits, with hits to the head being most lethal and shots which make contact elsewhere causing lesser loss of health.

Ein tolles Spiel, worauf ich durch meine Freunde aufmerksam geworden bin. Obwohl das Spiel schon ein gewisses Alter erreicht hat, ist es immer noch ziemlich beliebt bei den Spielern. Bei mir ebenso, doch, das Einzige, was ich mich an dem Spiel nervt, sind die Disconnetions, wenn man dabei ist, sich mit einem Server zu verbinden und man einfach disconnect beziehungsweise vom Server gekickt wird, doch ansonsten habe ich nichts gegen das Spiel einzuwenden, weiter so, Valve!
